Text: I have a problem. After installing the update and following the instructions, a couple of days later it told me it was expiring in 5 days. I authorized it again, and still? It's now expired. Not quite sure what to do.

I'm actually having the same problem, I've followed the steps you've outlined in here and in the RAR, and I can't manage to start it in Cubase anymore. Any help would be much appreciated, as this is the best piano vst I've EVER been able to play with =)
